org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.savepoint

接口 Savepoint

  • 所有超级接口:
    Versioned
    所有已知实现类:
    SavepointV1, SavepointV2

    public interface Savepoint
extends Versioned
    Savepoints are manually-triggered snapshots from which a program can be resumed on submission.

    In order to allow changes to the savepoint format between Flink versions, we allow different savepoint implementations (see subclasses of this interface).

    Savepoints are serialized via a SavepointSerializer and stored via a SavepointStore.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCheckpointId

        long getCheckpointId()
        Returns the checkpoint ID of the savepoint.

        Savepoints use the same mechanisms as regular checkpoints and are identified by a unique ID. This ID is used to reset the CheckpointIDCounter when restoring from a savepoint.

        返回:
        Checkpoint ID of the savepoint

      • getTaskStates

        @Deprecated
java.util.Collection<TaskState> getTaskStates()
        已过时。 Only kept for backwards-compatibility with versionS < 1.3. Will be removed in the future.
        Returns the snapshotted task states.

        These are used to restore the snapshot state.

        返回:
        Snapshotted task states

      • getMasterStates

        java.util.Collection<MasterState> getMasterStates()
        Gets the checkpointed states generated by the master.

      • getOperatorStates

        java.util.Collection<OperatorState> getOperatorStates()
        Returns the snapshotted operator states.

        These are used to restore the snapshot state.

        返回:
        Snapshotted operator states

      • dispose

        void dispose()
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Disposes the savepoint.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
